value.string: To notify the status of the current processing to Ops team
BOT will send notification to Ops team on the current processing
In case of failure while finding/entering to a field, ERROR flag will be raised and BOT will show 'Untimed message box' and on clicking 'Ok' button, main BOT will stop itself
